author: IGN
description:
Crests are some of Silksong’s most interesting collectibles, because they completely change your combat style, in addition to giving you different gear slots to play around with. The Beast Crest is one of the tougher ones to unlock, as you’ll have to find and fight a difficult boss called the Savage Beastfly. So here’s how to find it and beat it.

0:00 - Intro
0:23 - Savage Beastfly Location
2:03 - Savage Beastfly Boss Fight
3:12 - Using the Crest of Beast
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - How to Get the Crest of Beast | Savage Beastfly Boss Guide

author: IGN
description:
Journey with MARVEL Mystic Mayhem in Version 1.2: Siege in the Deep — as Atlantis falls into shadow and Namor fights to reclaim his throne. Torn from his crown by a monstrous usurper, Namor descends into exile — gathering strength, rallying heroes, and braving the abyss to reclaim what is his. But in the heart of the deep, the truth surfaces: the throne is no prize of kings, but a mirror. 
The monster upon it… is Namor himself. Will Namor rise as ruler of the deep — or sink into the abyss he created?
Marvel Mystic Mayhem is available now on iOS and Android.

#IGN #gaming
title: Marvel Mystic Mayhem - Official Version 1.2: Siege in the Deep Trailer

author: IGN
title: The Office co-creator Greg Daniels has a message for fans who aren't sure about The Paper. #ign #tv

author: IGN
description:
Hollow Knight Silksong has plenty of challenging bosses, but one of the earliest gatekeepers is the Skull Ant. It’s possible to stumble across him pretty early on, so the battle might take you by surprise. Here’s how to take him down, whether you’re prepared or not.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Hollow Knight Silksong - How to Beat the Skull Ant Miniboss - Skarrgard

author: IGN
description: Hollow Knight Silksong is not an easy game. It expects a lot from the player in terms of their reflexes, platforming skill, and their ability to pick up on subtle clues. For those that are struggling to find their footing, here are 18 essential beginner tips that can help take some of the edge off of Silksong's steep difficulty curves.
title: Hollow Knight Silksong - 18 Essential Beginner Tips
